Trade/Device Name(s): AG-6081 Single Blood Glucose Monitoring System
AG-6951 Single Blood Glucose Monitoring System
AG-6081 MULTI Blood Glucose Monitoring System
AG-6951 MULTI Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Andon Medical Co., Ltd. blood glucose monitoring systems using amperometric electrochemical biosensor technology for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, forearm, upper arm, calf and thigh for self-testing (single models) or multiple-patient use in professional healthcare settings (MULTI models) as an aid to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis or neonatal use.
